A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
What a waste of time. Nothing was really accomplished in this film. Can someone please tell me why Finn was given any screen time ? He accomplishes absolutely none of the tasks he sets out to do. 

Anyway\, no one does much of anything\, Luke isn't Luke\, but just Mark Hamill dressed up as Luke\, the force can just do kinda whatever each director dreams up\, and everything is terrible. 

But ultimately\, stalling for time is a major theme in this movie. A recurring theme\, so clever. Anyways all the director was doing was stalling for time until another director can come along and take care of the final movie.
